A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Absolutely remarkable film. Johnson gives us so much to process\, and delivers it so well. Even more than The Force Awakens\, this film filled this reviewer with a newfound sense of wonder. This is a supercharged masterpiece that really can't be compared to the other episodes. Despite some minor pacing flaws early on\, The Last Jedi is thoroughly epic and just so pleasing. Wonderful cinematography\, great humor\, great characterization. Truly the fantasy adventure Star Wars epic we all deserve. It's a shame Johnson won't return to round out trilogy.
